products.name: Poha - Flattened Rice
products.description: High quality Poha (Flattened Rice), ideal for quick and healthy breakfast and snacks.

more_details.Key Features: Lightweight flakes, easy to digest, suitable for weight watchers and diabetics.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in air-tight container to avoid moisture.
more_details.Return Policy: Non-returnable except for damaged or defective items within 72 hours.

products.name: Daliya - Broken Wheat
products.description: Premium quality Daliya (Broken Wheat), rich in fiber and nutrients for healthy meals.

more_details.Key Features: High fiber content, helps in digestion and weight management.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in a cool, dry place in airtight packaging.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement available within 72 hours on valid defective claims.

products.name: Ragi Flour - Finger Millet
products.description: Nutrient-rich Ragi Flour (Finger Millet) for healthy baking and cooking.

more_details.Key Features: High calcium and fiber, gluten-free and suitable for all age groups.
more_details.Storage Tips: Keep in airtight container, away from moisture and direct sunlight.
more_details.Return Policy: Returns accepted for defective or damaged packages within 72 hours.

products.name: Barley Grain
products.description: Whole Barley grains, nutritious and ideal for soups, salads, and healthy diets.

more_details.Key Features: Rich in fiber and antioxidants, supports heart health.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in sealed pack in cool, dry area.
more_details.Return Policy: Non-returnable except for damaged product claims within 72 hours.

products.name: Jowar Grain
products.description: Quality Jowar grain for traditional uses, high in fiber and naturally gluten-free.

more_details.Key Features: Supports digestive health, gluten-free, and rich in proteins.
more_details.Storage Tips: Store in airtight container away from direct sunlight.
more_details.Return Policy: Replacement allowed only for defective items within 72 hours of delivery.
